casebody.data:
Shidel et al., Appellants, v. Liberty Mutual Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Shidel v. Liberty Mut. Ins. Co. (1996), 77 Ohio St.3d 1220.]

(No. 95-1664 Submitted October 8, 1996 Decided December 11, 1996.) Homing & Homing, L.P.A., Richard A Homing and J. David Homing, for appellants. Oldham & Dowling and Hamilton DeSaussure, Jr., for appellee.

The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
